detailed_steps.description: Collect structured data on Snorkel AI, including financials, market position, and operational metrics.
Generate a dashboard from the structured payload to visualize key metrics and performance indicators.
Conduct a RAG (Red, Amber, Green) search for additional context on Snorkel AI, focusing on news articles, reports, and social media mentions.
Create a RAG-based dashboard that highlights potential risks and opportunities identified in the RAG search.
Assess the quality and accuracy of both the structured and RAG-based dashboards to ensure reliable insights.
Investigate potential risk signals such as layoffs, security incidents, and regulatory issues that may affect Snorkel AI.

# PE Dashboard for Snorkel-Ai (RAG-Generated)

## 1. Company Overview
. We strive to foster a diverse community of colleagues that welcomes, represents, and empowers all. We're as dedicated to communication and mutual support as we are to crafting a world-class product. We cultivate autonomy across the entire team by being open about our goals, wins, and challenges. We get to answers fast, focusing on what works—not what’s fancy. Join us

## 2. Funding History

Chris Glaze , Fred Sala July 10, 2025 Evaluating AI agents for insurance underwriting In this post, we will show you a specialized benchmark dataset we developed with our expert network of Chartered Property and Casualty Underwriters (CPCUs).
